nodes.text: Ianad Cisma was a Sy Myrthian male who worked as aide and consort to the Sy Myrthian Senator Toonbuck Toora while she served in the Senate of the Galactic Republic. In 32 BBY, he stood beside Toora in one of the repulsorpods in the Senate Building on the planet Coruscant when Queen Padmé Amidala of the planet Naboo addressed the Senate to resolve the Trade Federation's invasion of her homeworld. While in the Senate Building, Cisma wore a black robe. He had gray and white skin, red eyes, and brown hair.

Ianad Cisma was portrayed by an uncredited extra in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. He was not identified in the film, but received a name in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
